name: It's Not About The End
description:
It's Not About the End is a short story inspired by David Wehle's game Home is Where One Starts. This experience is focused on keeping good memories of our lives in mind and heart to make difficult times easier. While recalling good memories of your childhood, explore the map in search of parts for the car that was left by a loved one for you.

Find the parts for the car



Explore the area



Relax and enjoy a beautiful sunset
